title: ZAC skin ideas
body: I rection create a transparent skin for ZAC (like water or something), have his organs showing etc etc.. {{champion:154}}

replies.body: They need to make a red Zac skin, and give Vladamir Kalista's ult, so he can be like "lel blud"
A human Zac would be fine. Just a tall skinny elastic dude or a big fat blob guy who can stretch himself :D no point just changing his colour -_-

Zac + 6 Warmogs + Flat HP Runes + HP Masteries + Elixir of Iron Skin, this skin is called Monster Zac...

PS. He is invisible and you can see Gragas in his belly

He needs a **Yellow Demon** skin, desperately.

And instead of pure water skin, some have suggest **Pool Party** for him but I think it's better if he is a pile of **electrified water-ish organism**. While you can see the selections and stuff. So that explains his slow, jumping etc while remaining his original theme, sorta.

Also,** Iron Giant** skin. Why hasn't Riot made it is beyond me. Iron Giant fits Zac perfectly and I do mean, Perfectly, in every possible way. "You are who you choose to be" - .
